Replace.Text: Upplärningskarta
En karta som används enbart för handledningen.
Civilisationens gryning
Nödvändig kunskap för civilisationens gryning
In the beginning, the earth was without form. And void. And then the sun shone upon the sleeping earth. Into this swirling maelstrom of fire air and water, the first stirrings of life appeared.
OK
Visa mig hur
You are dismissed
Your assistance is appreciated
Fortsätt
Låt oss börja
Agreed
Mycket bra
Berätta mer
RÅDGIVARE
As your advisor I am qualified to assist you in all matters related to ruling our civilization.[NEWLINE]If you do not require my service, you can dismiss me to attend to other matters.
Greetings My Liege! As your personal advisor, I am qualified to assist you in all matters related to ruling our civilization. I am at your service.
All great civilizations begin with a great city, and our Settlers have found an ideal location. Order them to found a new city here.
Well done! You have founded your first city. From these roots your civilization will grow to stand the test of time. Now you must nurture and protect what you have created.
Security is of great importance. There are barbaric tribes near us who want nothing more than to pillage and plunder what is ours.
Direct the production efforts of this city to train Warriors to deal with this impending threat.
Training has begun, but it will be some time before our new Warriors are ready. There are no further matters to attend to right now.

Your city is busy training Warriors for its defense, but a great civilization cannot thrive on military might alone. We have people talented in the ways of science and discovery. You should employ them in researching new technologies which will advance our civilization.

Wise decision, Your Majesty. This technology will let us better extract the riches from the earth and increase [ICON_Production] Production in our cities. I will let you know when we have finished our research.

Your Majesty, hostile Barbarians have been seen near our [ICON_Capital] Capital. If left alone they are sure to attack our people and pillage our lands. Your newly trained Warriors await your orders to attack!

Our Warriors were victorious! They fought well to defend our people against this threat. However, the Barbarians are still envious of our civilization. We should be prepared in case they return in greater force.
There are other matters, Your Excellency.
Since Warrior training is complete, it is time to assign a new production task to the city.
The lands surrounding our city could be bountiful if we develop them. We should train Builders to create improvements to the lands within our borders.
There are mysteries that await us outside our borders in the uncharted lands beyond. The only way to find out is to explore.
Vid spelets början blir din stad och de närmaste landområdena synliga, men allt som ligger längre bort (illustrerat på kartan som tomt pergament) är delar av världen som du ännu inte utforskat.

Krigarenheter har ett [ICON_Movement] Förflyttningsvärde på 2.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Den blåfärgade konturlinjen som visas på markerna runt den markerade enheten visar den längsta sträckan som enheten kan flytta under en och samma omgång.

Öppen terräng, som till exempel Slätter och Gräsmark, förbrukar bara 1 [ICON_Movement] Förflyttningspoäng, medan svårare terräng, som Skog och Kullar, kommer förbruka 2 eller fler [ICON_Movement] Förflyttningspoäng. Flytta Krigar-enheten till den upplysta rutan genom att högerklicka på den.
FLYTTA KRIGARE
HÖGERKLICKA på den upplysta rutan för att flytta din Krigare.
Your Majesty, our Warriors have discovered a small Tribal Village whose inhabitants are welcoming and friendly. Shall we investigate it and send the Warriors to speak with them?

Att utforska Stambyar kan ge din civilisation en av flera olika omedelbara belöningar, som ytterligare [ICON_Citizen] Befolkning i din stad, eller en summa [ICON_Gold] Guld. Det är en god strategi att utforska så många Stambyar som möjligt.
FLYTTA KRIGARE
För att utforska en Stamby, flytta in en av dina enheter i Stambyns ruta. Försök flytta din Krigarenhet dit nu.
It appears that the Tribal Villagers are also harassed by the Barbarians. They are impressed by our culture, and have decided to join us in the fight!

Good news indeed! They are skillful Scouts and wily travelers. They can move faster than our Warriors, making them ideal for exploring the surrounding lands, but they are not as strong in combat. They eagerly await your orders.

Lägg märke till att Spejarenheten har en [ICON_Movement] Förflyttningspoäng på 3, vilket tillåter den att flytta en längre sträcka än andra enheter. Flytta Spejarenheten mot en outforskad del av kartan.
Scouts are excellent at exploring, but they are not as strong in combat as our Warriors. It is better to have them focus on exploration and survival rather than fighting our enemies.

A team of Builders has finished their training in our city. They are ready to work on improving the surrounding lands. There are ideal locations for the growing of [ICON_Food] Food to support our populace. Constructing a Farm there would increase our yield from those lands.

Byggare kan konstruera många olika typer av förbättringar på våra landområden. Vilken typ av förbättring de kan bygga på en viss ruta avgörs ofta av rutans typ av terräng. Slätter och Gräsmark är idealiska för Bondgårdar, vilket hjälper till att öka [ICON_Citizen] Befolkningen.
FLYTTA BYGGARE
Flytta din Byggare till det upplysta Slättområdet intill din stad.
KONSTRUERA BONDGÅRD
Konstruera en Bondgårdsförbättring här genom att klicka på knappen ”Bygg förbättring: Bondgård” bredvid enhetspanelen.

Att konstruera en Bondgård här har ökat avkastningen av [ICON_Food] Mat på den här rutan från 1 [ICON_Food] Mat per omgång till 2. Mängden [ICON_Food] Mat som din stad genererar avgör hur snabbt stadens Befolkning växer och ger dig fler [ICON_Citizen] Invånare som kan jobba på landrutorna. Mer [ICON_Food] Mat ger snabbare tillväxt.

Byggare kan konstruera upp till 3 förbättringar innan arbetsstyrkan är förbrukad. Det kvarvarande antalet användningar visas i Enhetspanelen. Den här Byggar-enheten har förbrukat en i arbetsstyrkan genom att bygga Bondgården, och har nu 2 kvar.

Your Majesty, it is once again time to choose where to direct the production efforts of our city. Your leadership is without equal and our civilization continues to thrive. Shall we construct a Monument to honor our civilization's growing greatness?
There are no more pressing issues at this time. Shall we continue with our duties?
Our explorers on the frontier have discovered a Barbarian camp. This is the source of the Barbarians threatening our region. We must destroy this stronghold, or they will continue to plague us.
I would advise you to use caution. The Barbarian camp is heavily defended by their best troops and will be hard to take. We should send an assault force of multiple military units to ensure victory.
In developing your military, it is always a good strategy to diversify. Not all units are created equal, some are better against others, and have abilities that separate them from the rest.
In developing your military, it is always a good strategy to diversify. Not all units are created equal, some are better against others, and have abilities that separate them from the rest.
Our explorers have spotted another friendly Tribal Village. I suggest we send our Scouts to investigate it.
A good city can become a great city through careful planning. Deciding where to place a city district is an important decision. Be sure to pick a location best suited to reap the most benefit.
Your Excellency, I am happy to announce that because of our city's prosperity, our [ICON_Citizen] Population has grown!

[ICON_Citizen] Befolkningsstorleken i din första stad har växt från 1 till 2. Så länge som staden får tillräckligt med mat och dess invånare är nöjda kommer den att fortsätta att växa. Stadens [ICON_Citizen] Invånare arbetar på de omgivande rutorna, och förbättringar bidrar till högre avkastningar. Större [ICON_Citizen] Befolkning bidrar till snabbare [ICON_Science] Forskning, snabbare [ICON_Production] Produktion, och snabbare [ICON_Culture] Kulturell tillväxt.

[ICON_Citizen] Befolkningsstorleken i din första stad har växt från 1 till 2. Så länge som staden får tillräckligt med mat och dess invånare är nöjda kommer den att fortsätta att växa. Stadens [ICON_Citizen] Invånare arbetar på de omgivande rutorna, och förbättringar bidrar till högre avkastningar. Större [ICON_Citizen] Befolkning bidrar till snabbare [ICON_Science] Forskning, snabbare [ICON_Production] Produktion, och snabbare [ICON_Culture] Kulturell tillväxt.
Det är alltid en god strategi att inte bara grunda nya städer för att expandera riket, utan också få dem att växa.
Det är alltid en bra strategi att inte bara grunda nya städer för att expandera riket, utan att också få dessa städer att växa.

In Civilization VI, you can get Eureka Moments that boost your technology research through in game achievements. This Eureka Moment was gained by discovering a natural wonder. Other achievements could be winning a battle with a specific unit or constructing a building. Achieving these greatly accelerates your technological progress.
Through exploration we have discovered a natural wonder of the world. There is no doubt that it could provide a great benefit to the one who settles the lands surrounding it.
Rekognosceringsenheter som Spejaren är unika på så vis att de kan få erfarenhet av att utforska och upptäcka delar av världen.
The workforce of our Builder unit has been expended. We will need to train more Builders to continue building improvements on the lands surrounding our cities.
Enacting new policies in our government can be of great benefit. Our people await your decree.
The opportunity has arrived for a change into a new and more powerful system of government. Let us strengthen our identity and enact more policies to govern our people.
We have the opportunity to develop a formal Trade Route between two cities. A Trader unit is required to establish such a route, which would be very beneficial for our economy.

In addition to bringing riches to our civilization, this Trade Route will gradually develop Roads between our cities. Roads allow our units to no longer be impaired by the difficult terrain through which they pass.
This military unit has proven themselves. From the experience they have gained in combat they are eligible to be granted a promotion. How will you award these brave souls?
The combat achievements of this unit have become legendary, and worthy of a name unique to them. With what title shall we honor them?
The health of this unit is very low and in danger of being lost. Allowing a unit to take a break from combat and rest will allow it to heal over time.
It is best to use caution when moving close to enemy units. Doing so will often force the unit to be in the enemy's 'zone of control', restricting its movement.
My liege, our city would do well with some farms or other improvements. I suggest we train a Builder soon.
Our Builders have been idle. Perhaps we should direct their efforts to improving the lands around our city.
Our capital flourishes! But I think it is time that we begin establishing roots elsewhere. Perhaps we should train a Settler.
My liege, we have an Envoy at our disposal. We can use the Envoy to gain favor with a city-state. Becoming friendly with a city-state neighbor can be greatly beneficial to our civilization.
Our City-State neighbors have made a request of us. If we can impress them, I think they will reward us handsomely.
I'm afraid I must report that we are bankrupt. It is imperative that we do whatever we can to ease ourselves of this debt. May I suggest we disband some of our military?
Your grace, I must warn you that some of the improved lands around our city have been pillaged. We should find those responsible and ensure no more damage can be done.
We have recently gained advanced knowledge in city planning. Creating districts in our cities can be much more powerful and lucrative than simple improvements like Farms and Mines.
Our military has learned the way of combining two military units into larger scale Corps. These Corps units are much more powerful than their singular counterparts.
Our military now is trained in the way of combining three military units into a single Army, much larger and more powerful than a Corps unit.

Your Grace, we have obtained greater knowledge in the art of building static fortifications. Building Walls around our cities will not only make them stronger against a foreign invader, but will also allow them to bombard nearby enemies.

Your grace! The enemy is at our gates, and this city is surrounded and under siege. Supplies and food cannot get through, and our city cannot heal its wounds. It is paramount that we break this encirclement.
An enemy is in range of our city. Order the city garrison to conduct a ranged attack against the invaders.
It is important to keep a close eye on our neighbors, and our people may be able to help. Listen carefully, for they are sometimes privy to more information than we are.
My liege, we are beginning to attract the attention of the Great People of the world. Of course, there are other leaders vying for their attention, too.
The more specialized districts we construct, the more we will draw in specialized Great People to share their talents with our civilization. I advise that we continue to build these.
A famous artist is inspired by our civilization, and has come to our lands to create great works of art. I suggest we find somewhere to house these masterpieces immediately.
This writer has been inspired by our civilization, and comes to our lands to create great works of writing. I suggest we find somewhere to house these masterpieces immediately.
Our populace has attracted a Great Prophet to our lands! Send this most holy person to our Holy Site and rejoice, for the time has come to found a religion for ourselves.
This musician is inspired by our civilization, and has come to our land to create great musical works. I suggest we find somewhere to house these masterpieces immediately.

Our civilization's attention to the naval arm of our military has given rise to a Great Admiral among our ranks. When deployed wisely among our ships we are sure to have a distinct advantage in battle.
Our civilization's dedication to military affairs has given rise to a Great General among our troops. When used wisely in the field, generals can change the tide of battle in our favor.
A great merchant has come to our civilization! Each one has a unique talent which will help our economy flourish.
Our dedication to the ways of science has attracted a great scientist to our civilization! I am certain we will be able to use them to benefit future scientific developments.

Constructing wonders of the world not only is a remarkable display of our empire's greatness, they have other benefits as well. Remember, other civilizations may also be competing in this endeavor, and there can only be one of each type in the world.

Just as our citizens have faith in your leadership, so they are beginning to have faith in a higher power. I think it is wise to cultivate this new way of thinking - perhaps there is some benefit to be gained.
The number of faithful has grown, and it is time for us to define our beliefs. Let us choose a pantheon to worship.
My liege, we have the ability to train religious missionaries to begin spreading our great religion to foreign lands.
Your majesty, I believe that we may benefit from recruiting an apostle to spread our religion. These holy people are quite powerful in the ways of conversion.
All other religions in the world are a threat to our faith. We can recruit Inquisitors to purge the heretics from our cities.
Your Excellency, I feel it is time to build some Neighborhoods for our growing populous. We should build these on our most beautiful lands - near natural wonders, or perhaps by the Coast.
My liege, all of our military has been destroyed and we are completely defenseless. Training military units is of utmost importance if we are to survive.
Our explorers have spotted another friendly Tribal Village. I suggest we send a Scout to investigate.
Your Majesty, keep your allies close and your enemies closer. We are now able to recruit a Spy who could help us better understand what it is that our neighbors do… On a more covert level.
Some resources, like this one, can be harvested. This will remove the resource in exchange for an immediate gain. But once it is removed, it will not come back.
Vi har upptäckt en stadsstat! Att etablera diplomatisk kontakt med dem skulle säkert vara gynnsamt för vårt rike. Kanske vi borde skicka dem ett sändebud…

There are several different types of City-States, and each may provide different benefits in return for our friendship. Our government, over time, will allow us to earn envoys to grow these relationships.
We have trained our first ranged unit, capable of hitting enemies from afar, while out of the range of hand-to-hand combat.
A siege unit! This will surely be useful if we choose to engage in a city attack.

We are now skilled in the construction of walls to protect our cities. In addition to providing protection from invaders, they are also excellent vantage points to bombard enemies with ranged attacks.
The enemy has surrounded the city and we are under siege. We must break this blockade or we will not be able to reinforce the garrison and repair our defenses.
My liege, this city has great defenses. With enough force, and the right military, I think we can take it.
Your majesty, there are times when peace is not the better option. I think we now have good reason to show our military might, but it is a careful decision that you must make alone.
It is a difficult world to face alone, but if I may, I do believe that one of our neighbors has proven worthy. Shall we extend the hand of friendship to them?

Your excellency, I feel it is time that we send a diplomatic delegation to those around us. This will allow us to sow the seeds of friendship, and perhaps give us a better insight as to what these other people may be doing.
I have good news! If we wish it, I think we may have an ally amongst our neighbors. This could come in handy if we ever find ourselves in need of help.
Do not distress, my liege. There are those out there who cannot be pleased, no matter what. It is important to remember what you stand for, and if the time comes… to fight for it.
My liege, I must warn you that denouncing other civilizations will have long and lasting consequences. It is important to think carefully on these matters.
Though it appears as if we may have offended someone, do not fret. There will always be other leaders with different ideas than our own.
It seems that our choices have won favor with one of our neighbors. But everyone has their own agenda, and I am sure that someone else may be watching us warily.
Your grace, If I may, I think it is time that we begin exploring what is beyond our shores. It may be that our land units would be fit for this opportunity.
It isn't just our lands that can be improved, but our waterways as well. I suggest we search for opportunities to exploit the resources along the shores.
I think we may have an opportunity to convince the followers of another religion of the error of their ways. Shall we seize this opportunity?
Foreign proselytizers have been seeking audience with our citizens. I must advise that we do something about this threat to our holy lands. Perhaps we should launch an inquisition.
Neighborhoods with higher appeal will house more citizens, whereas neighborhoods built by marsh, airports, or rainforest are not going to be very populated at all.
Our treasury is filled with gold, and I think it could be wise to make an investment. Perhaps we could expand our military.
We have not yet constructed a Holy Site, and the great prophet that we have attracted to our city has nowhere to go. Let's construct one!
Our populace has attracted a Great Prophet to our lands! Send this most holy person to Stonehenge and rejoice, for the time has come to found a religion for ourselves.
A Great Engineer has come to our civilization, ready to work hard to advance our infrastructure. Each has a different talent, but all of them can improve our cities in some way.
We now have the ability to build a Spaceport. If we further our research, we may be able to unlock the mysteries of the stars.
We have uncovered a way to increase our farming output. To tap into this potential, I suggest we try to maintain two adjacent farms to each plot of farmland.
We have furthered our agricultural technology yet again! Each farm that we build next to another will increase the output of both - I suggest we do this as often as possible.
Times have changed, and the era of diplomatic delegations has passed. It is important that we now establish Embassies with our friends and allies.
This earth is a gift, and it is important that we protect it. I recommend we establish a National Park. It may even attract tourists!
It isn't simply seagulls that flock to our shores now. If we build a Seaside Resort, we may be able to benefit from this new attraction to the ocean.
Though our own people are quite skilled, we can always benefit by learning from others. Perhaps we should look into beginning a Research Agreement with one of our neighbors.
A Relic! If we can house this for our people to see, I am certain that it will attract more of the faithful to our lands.
It appears we have become quite a popular attraction to the people of the world. I wonder how many more tourists will travel through our borders…
You are a brave and mighty conqueror! I have great faith that you will soon rule all of the lands before us.
Our religion spreads throughout the lands. It is a great joy to see so many people embracing what we know to be true. Though, there are still more who have yet to see the light.
Though our population grows, there is little room for our newest citizens. We should find a way to add more housing to this city.
Your grace, I worry about the happiness of our citizens. I would advise that we investigate a means of increasing their contentment.

Our people have discovered that they have a particular, useful skill that I think we should explore. If we begin construction on this new district now, I believe we will have it completed in no time at all.
Alas, all of this time that we spend at war is taking a toll on our people. I see pain in their eyes, and our productivity has reached record lows.
The building of an Archeological Museum will allow us to train Archeologists. There is so much to learn from the world, and they will help us gain this knowledge.
MARKERA NYBYGGAREN
Klicka på Nybyggar-enheten för att välja den.
AVSLUTA OMGÅNG
Det finns inga fler beslut att fatta under den här omgången, så klicka på knappen ”Nästa omgång” för att fortsätta.

Uppgifter som måste färdigställas innan du kan avsluta din omgång kommer visas i meddelandepanelen i nedre högra delen av skärmen.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Eftersom produktionen är klar i den här staden får du en påminnelse om att du måste välja någonting nytt att tillverka innan du kan avsluta din omgång.
ÅTGÄRDER KRÄVS
Klicka på ”Välj Produktion” för att välja nästa tillverkningsuppdrag.
ÅTGÄRDER KRÄVS
Forskning måste väljas innan omgången kan avslutas.

En Byggarenhet har lagts till i stadens Produktionskö. Det kommer ta flera omgångar innan utbildningen av den är klar. Eftersom det inte finns några fler beslut att fatta under den här omgången, så visas knappen ”Nästa omgång”.
AVSLUTA OMGÅNG
Klicka på knappen ”Nästa omgång” för att fortsätta.
AVSLUTA OMGÅNG

Eftersom din Krigarenhet har förbrukat alla sina [ICON_Movement] Förflyttningspoäng är den klar med sina åtgärder för den här omgången.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Både produktions- och forskningsuppgiften pågår fortfarande så det finns inga andra beslut att fatta.
Klicka på knappen ”Nästa omgång” igen för att fortsätta.
VÄLJ KRIGARE
Klicka på Krigar-enheten för att välja den.
GRUNDA EN STAD
Klicka på knappen ”Grunda stad” för att instruera Nybyggaren att grunda en ny stad på den här platsen.
VISA PRODUKTION
Öppna den här stadens Produktionsväljare genom att klicka på knappen ”Ändra produktion”.
PRODUKTIONSVÄLJAREN
Det här är stadens Produktionsväljare. Här kan du konstruera byggnader, skapa underverk, och träna både militära och civila enheter.
Select the Warrior button to start training a Warrior unit in your city.

”Civilization” är ett omgångsbaserat spel där beslut fattas och åtgärder utförs under en spelomgång, på samma sätt som när man spelar ett brädspel tillsammans med kamrater. När alla de andra spelarna har gjort sina drag kan en ny spelomgång börja.

Att bygga saker i staden tar tid. Hur många omgångar som kommer behövas visas intill varje sak i menyn.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Det här värdet baseras på sakens [ICON_Production] Produktionskostnad i förhållande till hur stor avkastning av [ICON_Production] Produktion staden har. Ju högre avkastning, desto färre omgångar behövs för att bygga saken.
AVSLUTA OMGÅNG
Klicka på knappen ”Nästa omgång” för att avsluta din spelomgång.
The Research Panel displays what technology your civilization is currently working toward. It is empty because you have not yet chosen a technology to research.
VÄLJ FORSKNING
Välj vetenskapen Gruvdrift från menyn för att börja forska fram den.
FLYTTA KRIGARE
Militära enheter kan attackera fiende-enheter genom att de flyttas in i fiendens ruta. Högerklicka på barbaren för att attackera den. Försök att göra det nu.
BYGG MONUMENT

I tillägg till att träna enheter kan din stad också fokusera sin produktion på att konstruera byggnader som till exempel ett Monument.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Försök bygga ett nu genom att välja det i stadens Produktionskö.
With Barbarians in our midst, I think our people would be more comfortable if our Warriors were closer to the city. Order them to return and defend.
Enheter kan beordras att flytta längre distanser genom att man ger dem en fleromgångsorder. Detta gör att man slipper ge dem nya förflyttningsinstruktioner varje omgång för att nå destinationen.
FLYTTA KRIGARE
Försök att beordra krigaren att återvända till staden genom att klicka på knappen ”Flytta till”, och sen klicka på staden.
When using a multi-move order, a path will display on the map indicating the path the unit will take, along with indicators of the number of turns until it reaches the destination.
Your Majesty, our Scouts are eager to explore the surrounding lands and uncover new areas of the continent. Send them forth!
Det finns inga fler ärenden som måste hanteras för närvarande, ers nåd.

Our brightest minds have discovered new and ingenious ways to extract precious stones and metals from the earth. There is an abundance of valuable Stone nearby, it would be wise to send our Builders to construct a Quarry there.

Resurser av olika slag är utspridda över kartan. Det finns tre typer av resurser::[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lyxresurser: Dessa bidrar till dina invånares belåtenhet och lycka.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Strategiska resurser: Nödvändiga för att skapa vissa mycket kraftfulla militära enheter.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bonusresurser: Ger ytterligare avkastning av [ICON_Food] Mat , [ICON_Production] Produktion, eller [ICON_Gold] Guld.
BYGG STENBROTT

Den här Stenen är en Bonusresurs. Den ger ytterligare +1 [ICON_Production]Produktion i staden.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Om du bygger förbättringen Stenbrott här kommer det öka avkastningen till +2 [ICON_Production]Produktion.
Flytta Byggar-enheten till Stenresursen, och få dem att konstruera ett Stenbrott där.

Stenbrottsförbättringar ökar [ICON_Production]Produktionen i staden de hör till. Högre Produktion gör att enheter och byggnader kan konstrueras fortare. Enkelt uttryckt gör högre Produktion att det krävs färre omgångar för att bygga något i staden.
Våra invånare känner sig lättare över Krigarnas återkomst till staden. Får jag föreslå att de antar en mer defensiv position för tillfället? De kommer vara på sin vakt mot hotet från barbarerna.

Goda nyheter! Våra hantverkare har slutfört konstruktionen av Monumentet i vår stad! Det är en symbol för vår civilisations bedrifter och uthållighet, och inspirerar vårt folk att våga sig längre in i markerna bortanför gränsen.

Your Majesty, we should expand our realm. We have adventurous families ready to strike out and claim new lands for the glory of our people. If we do not expand our borders, then in time we will find ourselves surrounded by our enemies.
Settlers will take some time to complete their training. Our Scout should continue exploring undiscovered lands. I would advise we keep our Warriors in the [ICON_Capital] Capital to defend it.

The Settlers are ready to embark on their journey to found a new city and expand our civilization. The lands beyond are dangerous, and it would be wise to insure their protection by sending them with a military escort.

Our Settlers should be safe on their journey under the protection of our Warriors. But we will be without protection in the [ICON_Capital] Capital once they leave. I suggest we begin training a Slinger unit immediately to defend the city.
Well done, Your Majesty. Our great minds have already begun work on new ways to store and preserve our food.
May the triumphs of our great civilization know no bounds! Our second great city awaits your direction. With your wise leadership it too shall grow and thrive.
Like our [ICON_Capital] Capital, this city can produce buildings and units, increase its population, and expand its borders. More cities means more to manage, but I have great faith in Your Majesty.
Your Majesty has shown wisdom and understanding in the fundamentals of ruling a civilization. I shall be available to assist you at any point should you wish, but for now I take my leave.
Our farmers are very skilled at providing [ICON_Food] Food for our people, but we need to find better ways to store it. I suggest we direct the efforts of our scientists to solving this problem.

Our dedication to developing a consistent written language has allowed us to record our knowledge for future use. If we were to provide a common location in our city for our scientists to share this information I'm sure their pursuits would be much more efficient.
Excellent! Construction on a Campus has begun. Our scientists look forward to its completion.
The Campus is complete and we have already begun to see its benefits. Construction of a Library would be ideal at such a location, should your highness agree to it.
It seems we are not the only people competing for control of these lands. I suggest we proceed with caution.
Your Highness we are at war. Security of the realm is of greatest importance. We must begin mobilizing an army immediately.
Uniting your governance with a strict code of laws can be most beneficial to us. I think it is time to enact a set of policies to strengthen our progress toward a more refined civilization.

Strict discipline in our military ranks would give us an edge against the unorganized Barbarian horde. More structured Urban Planning will make our cities more organized and efficient. I suggest we enact these policies.
Nurturing our populace is important, but we must also protect them. There are barbaric tribes near us who want nothing more than to pillage and plunder what is ours.
We continue to make progress on training a team of Builders, and research is continuing as planned. [NEWLINE] Our Warriors are very close to the Tribal Village and should arrive soon.
Our people have looked to the heavens, and begun to wonder if our fortunes may be guided by the hands of a greater power. Who are these great gods, and what blessings might they bestow on us?

In a life dedicated to searching for guidance in the mysteries of the universe, one has had an epiphany that will guide our faithful for millennia to come. Let the teachings of this Great Prophet spread people of all cultures across the face of the earth. By proliferating our Religion, we may be victorious over our rivals.
Congratulations, My Liege! Your leadership has inspired our people to greatness, and now one among them has attained true genius. Their contribution will reverberate throughout history.
Your Majesty, we must reach out to our neighbors in trade. Through them, we stand to boost our economy, and gain new insights into the mysteries of the world.

My Liege, we have made contact with some outsiders. These people are more advanced than the Tribal Villagers that have aided us in the past. Should we extend a hand in friendship, or seek to conquer them?
Caution, your majesty. This city is hostile to us and its people will surely fight to the bitter end to keep it out of our hands. We must be well prepared
VÄLJ FORSKNING
VÄLJ FORSKNING
Klicka på knappen ”Välj Forskning” för att visa Forskningsväljaren.
CHANGE RESEARCH
Välj vetenskapen Krukmakeri från Forskningsmenyn.
NOTIFICATIONS

If there are units that have not moved this turn and are awaiting orders, you can address them by clicking the Unit Needs Orders notification. Click the notification now to be taken to your Scout unit so you may issue new orders.
MOVE SCOUT
Fortsätt att utforska världen med din Spejarenhet.

När en militär enhet inte befinner sig i förflyttning är det ofta en god idé att befästa enheten. När enheten beordras att befästa sin position, kommer den använda upp till 2 omgångar för att förstärka sin position. Detta kommer ge den högre [ICON_Strength] Stridsstyrka om den blir attackerad.
BEFÄST KRIGAREN
Försök att beordra Krigaren att göra så genom att klicka på knappen ”Befäst”.
FORTIFY BONUS
Den här enheten kommer nu ha en fördel när den försvarar sig i strid. Om enheten flyttas kommer den dock förlora sin befästa status, och måste beordras befästa sig igen för att få bonusen.
BUILDER WORKFORCE

Din Byggare har fortfarande en del av sin arbetsstyrka kvar.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Du kan antingen använda den för att bygga en Gruva på rutan med Kullen (+[ICON_Production] Produktion), eller en Bondgård på Slätt-rutan (+[ICON_Food] Mat).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Detta kan kräva mer än en spelomgång – en för att flyttta enheten, och ytterligare en för att bygga förbättringen.

Kom ihåg: Byggare kan bara konstruera förbättringar innanför din stads gränser.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Genom att generera [ICON_Culture] Kultur kommer din stads gränser expandera, och ge dig tillgång till fler resurser.
UTFORSKNING
Fortsätt gärna utforska kartan med din Spejar-enhet. Avsluta din spelomgång när du är klar med att ge order till både Byggaren och Spejaren.

Your city has finished production on the Monument building. All buildings contribute to a city’s development in specific ways. The Monument will increase the [ICON_Culture] Culture generated by the city, which extends the city’s influence over additional hexes.
TRAIN SETTLERS
Begin training a Settler unit.

Open the Production Chooser and begin training a Settler unit. Remember, the Production Chooser can either be accessed from the city's Information Panel or from the Choose Production reminder in the Notification Panel on the right side of the game view.

Units like Settlers and Builders are non-combat, civilian units and thus cannot defend themselves. This leaves them highly vulnerable to be captured or killed by enemy units. However, your military units can act as protection for the civilian unit if they occupy the same hex.
An easy way to move the two units together is by linking them together until they reach their destination.
ESCORT SETTLER
Select either the Settler or the Warrior and click the Escort button in the unit panel.
MOVE FORMATION
Begin moving the units southeast toward the indicated map marker. If you have not yet revealed that part of the map it might make your journey easier if you sent your Scout there as well.

In a game of Civilization, once a player loses all of their cities, the game is over. It is very important that you protect your cities, especially your [ICON_Capital] Capital, from any foreign threat.
TRAIN SLINGERS
Add a Slinger unit to the city's Production Queue and end your turn when you are finished.

As is often the case in history, technological discoveries inspire new technologies, building upon knowledge gained in the past. In a game of Civilization, this is simulated by the Technology Tree. Click the open Technology Tree button in the Research Panel to view it.
Öppna Vetenskapsträdet
Klicka för att öppna Vetenskapsträdet
The Technology Tree displays all of the researchable technologies available in a game of Civilization, from the Ancient era all the way to the Information era and beyond.
The gold colored nodes represent technologies that you have already finished researching. You have just finished researching Pottery, so it has been marked as complete.
The dark grey nodes represent technologies that are available to begin researching, but are not complete.
Light grey nodes represent technologies that are not yet available to begin researching. These technologies need to first be unlocked by researching one or more prerequisite technologies.
Since we have already researched Pottery, we are now able to begin research on the Writing technology.
VÄLJ FORSKNING
Start research on Writing by clicking on the Writing node in the Technology Tree.

Notice the Writing technology node status has changed, indicating that it is currently being researched. The number of turns required to finish research on a technology is indicated in the upper right corner of the node.
The symbols displayed inside the technology node represent new units, buildings, wonders and abilities that are unlocked by the technology once it is completed.

For example, once you have finished researching the Writing technology, you will be able to construct the Campus district as well as the Library building in all of your cities. The Campus and Library allow you to increase the amount of [ICON_Science] Science you generate each turn, allowing you to research technologies faster!
Since you're done designating new research, we can close the Technology Tree by clicking the X button in the upper right corner.
Close Tree
Click to close the Technology Tree
Continue moving your Settler unit to the indicated location.

In choosing a location to settle a new city, it is important to look at the fertility of the surrounding land. Proximity to sources of [ICON_Food] Food, resources, and fresh water are all very important. For this tutorial we have already found an ideal location for you.
When your Settler unit is able, click the Found City button to create a new city here. This may require moving on to the next turn if your Settler is out of [ICON_Movement] Movement points.

To win a game of Civilization, as a player you need to defeat all other civilizations in the world. There are multiple ways to achieve this. You can conquer their cities militarily, bringing them into your civilization. You can also win technologically, or through cultural or religious dominance.

On the path to victory, there are fundamental strategies to assist you in building your civilization.[NEWLINE]---[NEWLINE]For this tutorial, we have provided four goals for you to achieve. Complete all four and you can complete the tutorial. However, in order to WIN the tutorial, you need to complete the fifth goal.

Congratulations![NEWLINE]---[NEWLINE]You have completed the fundamentals of growing and maintaining a civilization that will stand the test of time. You can finish the tutorial, or you can keep playing and win this game by eliminating the rival civ.

In this tutorial you are playing on a small map with a single rival civilization. A standard game of Civilization presents a larger map of the world, with several rival civilizations, all competing to win. The task is larger, but the goals remain the same.
To win this game, you must conquer all the rival civilization’s city(s) with your military.[NEWLINE]---[NEWLINE]Good luck!
Open the Production Chooser of your first city by clicking the production button on the City Banner.
In Civilization VI, there are many types of districts that can be built in your cities, each with a specific purpose.

By completing research on Writing, you are now able to construct a Campus district in your city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Campus district is dedicated to increasing the amount of [ICON_Science] Science generated by the city that contains it.
Many districts in the game also get a bonus depending on where they are placed within the city. The Campus gets a bonus when built next to Mountains or Jungles.
BUILD CAMPUS
Click the Campus button in the Production Chooser to start building one in this city.
When placing a district, the map changes slightly to indicate ideal locations in which to build it.
This plot has Mountains on two of its edges, each providing +1 [ICON_Science] Science per turn. Placing the Campus here would be ideal.
Click this hex to begin building a Campus here.
Since you have finished the Writing technology, you now must choose what to research next. If you would like a suggestion, Animal Husbandry and Bronze Working are both good choices.

Animal Husbandry will allow you to build the Pasture and Camp improvements in your cities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bronze Working will help you militarily by unlocking the Encampment district, as well as allow you to train Spearmen.

Some buildings can only be constructed in districts. The Library is a building exclusive to the Campus district. Since we have completed construction on the Campus, we are now able to build a Library on it.
BUILD LIBRARY
Click the Choose Production button in the lower right to begin building a Library.

Congratulations!![NEWLINE]You have won your first game of Civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You are now ready to take on much larger challenges and objectives, explore new worlds, meet new civilizations for the first time, and achieve victory on your terms.
When engaged in a war with another civilization, it is best to have a sufficient number of combat units, both to defend your cities as well as fight abroad.

Sometimes it is necessary to suspend production on a building or district in order to train units to fight the war. To do this, simply change the current production task of the city to the combat unit you wish to create.
When you are satisfied with the size of your military, you can resume production on what was being built previously without losing the progress you made on it.

Engaging in diplomatic relations with other civilizations can be very lucrative. Of course, relations can also go sour. How you interact with other leaders is your choice. Just remember, in the path to victory, you cannot always be everyone’s friend.
Genom att samla [ICON_Culture] Kultur har du just låst upp Lagsamling, you have just unlocked Code of Laws, som innehåller ditt första statsskick: Hövdingadöme.
STATSSKICK
To access it, click the Government button.
Det finns många typer av statsskick i Civilization VI. I tillägg till olika andra fördelar har varje statsskick ett antal platser där du kan anta politiska inriktningar.
Det första statsskicket som har blivit tillgängligt är Hövdingadöme. Det har 2 tillgängliga politikplatser. Den första platsen är för Militär politik, den andra är för Ekonomisk politik.
REGERINGSPOLITIK
Klicka på knappen ”Ändra Politik”

För att lägga in en politisk inriktning, klicka och dra politikkortet från högra delen till rätt politikplats till vänster.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Pröva det nu genom att lägga till kortet Disciplin till platsen för Militär politik, och sedan kortet Stadsplanering till platsen för Ekonomisk politik. Klicka på knappen ”Bekräfta Politik” när du är klar.

By enacting these policies, your military units will now get a +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength bonus when fighting against Barbarians. Also, your cities receive +1 [ICON_Production] Production per turn, allowing them to train units and construct buildings faster than before.

Much in the same way you research new technologies by generating [ICON_Science] Science in your cities, you unlock civics by generating [ICON_Culture] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You have already unlocked the Code of Laws civic which enabled you to establish your first government.
Now you need to select a new civic to advance toward.
CIVICS TREE
Open the Civics Tree by clicking the Civics Tree button in the upper left corner of the screen.
Similar to the Technology Tree, the Civics Tree has different choices and paths as you progress through the game.[NEWLINE]For this tutorial, click the Craftsmanship civic to start advancing next.
CHOOSE CIVIC
Select the Craftsmanship civic
Close Tree
Click to close the Civics Tree
Klicka på ”Nästa omgång” för att fortsätta.
TRÄNA BYGGARE
Klicka på ”Byggare” för att börja utbilda en Byggarenhet.
Städerna är hörnpelaren i alla stora civilisationer. En stads storlek representeras av dess [ICON_Citizen]Befolkning, som visas till vänster om namnplattan.

A Slinger unit has finished training in your capital. Slingers are ranged class units, allowing them to attack from distance without engaging in melee combat. This keeps them from taking reciprocal damage during the attack.

Varje stad lägger också beslag på den omgivande marken, så att den blir din. Vidden av ditt landområde indikeras av den färglagda gränsen runt staden. Vilka marktyper som hamnar innanför gränsen kommer ha en stor betydelse för dina städers potentiella styrka.
Ranged units also tend to have lower defense strength than their melee fighting counterparts, so it is best to keep them close to friendly units of other types for protection.

Du måste bestämma hur varje stad i din civilisation ska växa och expandera med tiden, hur du ska förbättra marken som står under din kontroll, och skapa nya byggnader och distrikt innanför dina gränser.

As you progress through the game and research new technologies, you will unlock better, stronger, and more advanced units. Building a strong and diverse fighting force is essential in competing against other civilizations, and preserving the safety of your people.
We have just completed research on Writing.

I tillägg till [ICON_Food] Mat behöver ditt folk också [ICON_Amenities] Bekvämligheter i sina städer. En källa till [ICON_Amenities] Bekvämlighet är Lyxresurser, som till exempel den här [ICON_Resource_Coffee] Kaffe-resursen nära din [ICON_Capital] Huvudstad. Nu när forskningen av Krukmakeriet är klar vore det en god idé att forska fram Konstbevattning härnäst, för att det möjligt för dina Byggare att förbättra lyxresurser som just detta [ICON_Resource_Coffee] Kaffe. Detta kommer förse vår stad med [ICON_Amenities] Bekvämlighet, och öka dess lycka.
You have completed the goal of improving a tile within range of the second city!
You have completed the goal of exploring another tribal village!
You have completed the goal of growing a city to a population of six!
You have completed the goal of building five improvements!
You have completed the goal of constructing Walls in your [ICON_Capital] Capital city!
You have completed the goal of constructing a Barracks!
Varje stad genererar olika typer av avkastning vid början av varje ny omgång. Denna avkastning kommer från de rutor som staden kontrollerar.

Varje ruta innanför dina stadsgränser kan ge ett antal olika avkastningar som hjälper dig föra din civilisation framåt. [ICON_Food] Mat och [ICON_Production] Produktion är två typer av avkastning.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] [ICON_Food] Mat är bränslet för din stads tillväxt, så att din [ICON_Citizen] Befolkning ökar. Ju mer [ICON_Food] Mat, desto snabbare tillväxt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] [ICON_Production] Produktion används för att bygga nya föremål, som till exempel militära enheter och stadsförbättringar. Ju mer [ICON_Production] Produktion din stad har, desto fortare kan du bygga saker.
Dock måste en ruta brukas av din [ICON_Citizen] Befolkning för att du ska kunna få avkastningen från den rutan.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Varje [ICON_Citizen]Invånare kan bruka 1 ruta innanför dina gränser.
Att öka stadens [ICON_Citizen]Befolkning är väldigt viktigt för att kunna dra nytta av all avkastning från den omgivande marken.

It is now up to you to decide what you would like to produce in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Suggestions:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]- Train a Builder to improve more of the surrounding lands within your borders.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]- Train a combat unit to expand the size and strength of your military.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-Build a Granary to provide additional [ICON_Food] Food for your city as well as more [ICON_Housing] Housing for your [ICON_Citizen] Population.
Mål:
Att SLUTFÖRA handledningen:
Att VINNA handledningen:
UTFORSKA: Utforska oupptäckta områden.
Använd din spejare för att hitta och utforska alla Stambyar i området.
FÖRSVAR: Flytta Krigaren tillbaka till staden.
Flytta tillbaka Krigaren till staden som försvar.
FÖRSVAR: Behåll Krigaren i staden.
Håll Krigaren i staden för att försvara den.
TRÄNA NYBYGGARE: Fullborda träningen av en Nybyggarenhet.
Fullborda träningen av en Nybyggarenhet för att expandera din civilisation.
GRUNDA EN NY STAD: Eskortera Nybyggaren till den bestämda platsen.
Eskortera Nybyggaren med din Krigare till den bestämda platsen.
UTVECKLA: Använd Byggaren för att förbättra marken kring den nya staden.
Använd en Byggare för att förbättra marken kring den nya staden.
VETENSKAP: Konstruera ett Campus i din huvudstad.
Fullborda konstruktionen av ett Campus i din huvudstad.
Hitta och utforska en annan Stamby.
Uppnå en Befolkning på 6 i någon av dina städer.
UTNYTTJA: Bygg 5 förbättringar.
UTPLÅNA: Eliminera hotet från barbarerna i ditt område, och förstör barbarlägret.
Eliminera den andra civilisationen.
BYGG FÖRBÄTTRING: Använd din Byggarenhet för att konstruera en tredje förbättring i din stad.
Bygg Antika murar i din huvudstad.
Bygg ett Militärförläggningsdistrikt och uppgradera det med en Kasern.
Träna fem Militära enheter, inklusive minst en Bågskytt eller Murbräcka. [EJ IMPLEMENTERAT].
FÖR ATT VINNA: Eliminera den andra civilisationen genom att erövra deras huvudstad.
TO GAIN HOUSING:
TO GAIN AMENITIES:
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Construct Buildings: {1_Buildings}
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Add Districts: {1_Districts}

[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Improve Luxury resources.
